text: Six killed in Zaire city bombing $- eyewitness. NAIROBI 1997-02-17 At_least six people were killed and as many as 20 wounded when three Zairean government jets bombed the rebel-held east Zaire city of Bukavu on Monday, an eyewitness said. The eyewitness, an aid worker who declined to be identified, told Reuters by telephone from Bukavu that he counted the dead and wounded after the bombing. The aid worker said the bombs also dug holes three metres deep (10 feet) when they fell around Bukavu market and near the governor's residence. "_ Among the dead were a very young child about 14 months old and one woman, _" he said. He said many Bukavu residents were fleeing the city with belongings on their heads, heading towards surrounding hills. Rebel radio broadcast appeals for calm.
title: KENYA : Six killed in Zaire city bombing $- eyewitness.
